channel.title: Can somone help me with some html code please :)
channel.description:
hey, well im very new to html well infact i got a book about it 2 days ago and went from there, i know all the basics and some stuff leading to the higher lvls but i need help with some code i wrote. Its surposed to send me an email once its filled in showing me what people have typed in the boxes. Ive uploaded it to geocities and every time the box is completed i get an error like this: The requested method is not allowed for this URL. [code] Please check the URL for proper spelling and capitalization. If you're having trouble locating a destination on Yahoo!, try visiting the Yahoo! home page or look through a list of Yahoo!'s online services. Also, you may find what you're looking for if you try searching below.[/code] here is my html code: [code] MuNky Web Search - Get listed, get traffic!



To add you're web site address to the "MuNkY Web Search" directory a few small forms must be filled out, Upon completion they will be sent to the site administrator who will confirm the address and then add it to the directory. Then viewers will be able to search for your site through the "MuNkY Web Search" directory gaining you traffic!

Please enter your full URL, including the http:// prefix. For example: http://www.sitename.com

In the "Site Description" box please add a short description of your site and its content. Under the "Keywords" box please also include any keywords that may associate with your web page, An example of these could be:

MuNky Web Search is a listing FREE web directory service along with other usefull link's and information, get listed and get traffic!

Keywords:munky,listing,free,links,free listing,usefull,myles,panayiotis.




Your Name:

Site URL:

Keywords:

Select the category that fits your website:

Site Description:

[/code] i know it may not be the best ever but if somone could fix it or point out the error i will arrange some type of [size=10pt][font=Verdana]reward[/font][/size] or something :)

item.source: Can somone help me with some html code please :)

item.title: Can somone help me with some html code please :)
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

There are many free hosts out that do support php. I don't know of any right off, it's been years since I've used a free webhost, but they are around.

You will need a host that supports some kind of server side language if you wish to write your own form mailer. There are also some off-site php/perl hosts that you can link your form to that could handle the server side of things. If you don't want to bother with it, you could simply link your visitors with the regular html hyperlink as yna_ajhear5 has shown you. But these are incredibly annoying and unproffesional. No one wants to open up another program (mail client) just to send an email to someone from a link on a website. You can also specify a prewritten subject with the mailto link like so:
Email me here!

Enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: Can somone help me with some html code please :)
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

hey,

well im very new to html well infact i got a book about it 2 days ago and went from there, i know all the basics and some stuff leading to the higher lvls but i need help with some code i wrote. Its surposed to send me an email once its filled in showing me what people have typed in the boxes. Ive uploaded it to geocities and every time the box is completed i get an error like this:

The requested method is not allowed for this URL.

Please check the URL for proper spelling and capitalization. If you're having trouble locating a destination on Yahoo!, try visiting the Yahoo! home page or look through a list of Yahoo!'s online services. Also, you may find what you're looking for if you try searching below.

here is my html code:

<html>
<head>
<title>MuNky Web Search - Get listed, get traffic!</title>
<meta name="description" content="MuNky Web Search is a listing FREE web directory service along with other
usefull link's and information, get listed and get traffic!">
<meta name="keywords"content="free site listing,usefull links,munky search,listing,listing,free,
myles,panayiotis,panayiotis,solemn wishes,free search,search">
<meta name="Author"content="myles panayiotis">
<meta htpp-equiv="expires" content="31/1/3000">
<meta htpp-equiv="reply to" content="myles_1991@hotmail.com">
<meta name="copyright" content="copyright © 2006-2007 munky software all rights reserved">
<meta name="date" content="1.15pm sunday 12/3/06">
</head>
<body>
<img src="munkylogo.bmp" boarder="0">
<br>
<br>
<center>
<body bgcolor="#F0F8FF" topmargin="0"marginwidth="0" marginheight="0">
<table width="615" border="1" align="center" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0"
bgcolor="#A9A9A9" height="377" bordercolor="#000000" bordercolordark="#000000"bordercolorlight="#000000">
<tr>
<td width="100%"height="100%" bgcolor="#A9A9A9" bordercolor="#000000" bordercolorlight="#A9A9A9" bordercolordark="#292929">
<img src="munkyregistration.jpg" boarder="0">
</center>
<br>
<br>
<center>
To add you're web site address to the "MuNkY Web Search" directory a few small forms must be filled out,
Upon completion they will be sent to the site administrator who will confirm the address and then add it to
the directory. Then viewers will be able to search for your site through the "MuNkY Web Search" directory gaining
you traffic!
<p>Please enter your full URL, including the http://  prefix. For example:  http://www.sitename.com <br>
<br>
In the "Site Description" box please add a short description of your site and its content.
Under the "Keywords" box please also include any keywords that may associate with your web page, An example of
these could be:<br>
<br>
MuNky Web Search is a listing FREE web directory service along with other
usefull link's and information, get listed and get traffic!<br>
<br>
Keywords:munky,listing,free,links,free listing,usefull,myles,panayiotis.
</center>
<br>
<br>
<br>
  <form METHOD=POST ACTION="messagesend.html">
<input type=hidden name="redirect" value="messagesend.html">
<input type="hidden" name="recipient" value="rune-nation@hotmail.co.uk">
<input type="hidden" name="subject" value="Form Submission">
<p>Your Name:<br><input TYPE="text" NAME="Name" SIZE="40" MAXLENGTH="40">
</p>
<p>Site URL:<br><input TYPE="text" NAME="Name" SIZE="40" MAXLENGTH="40">
</p>
<p>Keywords:<br><input TYPE="text" NAME="Name" SIZE="40" MAXLENGTH="40">
</p>
<p>Select the category that fits your website:<br>
<select NAME="question">
<option VALUE="question0">Select One Of The Bellow
<option VALUE="question1">Technology/computer's
<option VALUE="question2">Help/tutorial site
<option VALUE="question3">Gaming site
<option VALUE="question4">Information data-base
<option VALUE="question5">Health/fitness
<option VALUE="question6">Home,Friends,Family
<option VALUE="question7">Music, fashion
<option VALUE="question7">Other
</select>
</p>
<p>Site Description: <br>
<textarea NAME="comments" ROWS="10" COLS="50" wrap="virtual">
</textarea>
</p>
<p>
<input TYPE="submit" NAME="Request" VALUE="Submit This Form">
<input TYPE="reset" NAME="Clear" VALUE="Clear Form">
</p>
</body>
</html>

i know it may not be the best ever but if somone could fix it or point out the error i will arrange some type of [size=10pt][font=Verdana]reward[/font][/size] or something

Read full topic
